metadata.title: CVE-2015-8239 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
The SHA-2 digest support in the sudoers plugin in sudo after 1.8.7 allowslocal users with write permissions to parts of the called command toreplace them before it is executed.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8239` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

sudo - 1.8.16-0ubuntu1
sudo-ldap - 1.8.16-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: sudo package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.8.16-0ubuntu1').
